3915.verse: فَكَذَّبُوهُ|But they denied him,|157|209|6500$فَإِنَّهُمْ|so indeed, they|123|226|3266$لَمُحْضَرُونَ|(will) surely be brought,|178|230|14702$

3923.verse: إِلَّا|Except|65|94|86$عَجُوزًا|an old woman|111|170|13041$فِى|(was) among|106|165|89$ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ|those who remained behind.|206|236|6581$

3925.verse: وَإِنَّكُمْ|And indeed, you|127|167|6681$لَتَمُرُّونَ|surely pass|95|174|14705$عَلَيْهِم|by them|74|153|22$مُّصْبِحِينَ|(in the) morning,|131|171|9817$

3926.verse: وَبِٱلَّيْلِ‌ۗ|And at night.|107|188|14706$أَفَلَا|Then will not|105|268|452$تَعْقِلُونَ|you use reason?|128|209|453$

3930.verse: فَٱلْتَقَمَهُ|Then swallowed him|152|185|14710$ٱلْحُوتُ|the fish,|88|154|14711$وَهُوَ|while he|74|140|305$مُلِيمٌ|(was) blameworthy.|152|185|14712$

3932.verse: لَلَبِثَ|Certainly, he (would have) remained|260|287|14714$فِى|in|48|101|89$بَطْنِهِۦٓ|its belly|79|132|12616$إِلَىٰ|until|53|106|118$يَوْمِ|the Day|72|99|10$يُبْعَثُونَ|they are resurrected.|162|162|6277$

3933.verse: ۞ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُ|But We cast him|129|167|14715$بِٱلْعَرَآءِ|onto the open shore|155|232|14716$وَهُوَ|while he|74|151|305$سَقِيمٌ|(was) ill.|77|115|14660$

3936.verse: فَـَٔـامَنُواْ|And they believed,|144|175|14723$فَمَتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ|so We gave them enjoyment|210|272|14724$إِلَىٰ|for|53|115|118$حِينٍ|a while.|71|102|390$

3937.verse: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ|Then ask them,|123|131|14578$أَلِرَبِّكَ|`Does your Lord|127|143|14725$ٱلْبَنَاتُ|(have) daughters|135|151|14726$وَلَهُمُ|while for them|114|130|14727$ٱلْبَنُونَ|(are) sons?`|103|111|14728$

3940.verse: وَلَدَ ٱللَّهُ|`Allah has begotten,`|165|224|14732$وَإِنَّهُمْ|and indeed, they|132|250|5517$لَكَـٰذِبُونَ|surely (are) liars.|133|192|5518$

3915.verse: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],

3916.verse: Except the chosen servants of Allah.

3917.verse: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

3919.verse: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

3920.verse: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

3921.verse: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.

3922.verse: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,

3923.verse: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].

3925.verse: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning

3926.verse: And at night. Then will you not use reason?

3927.verse: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.

3928.verse: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.

3929.verse: And he drew lots and was among the losers.

3930.verse: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.

3931.verse: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,

3932.verse: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.

3933.verse: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.

3934.verse: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.

3935.verse: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.

3936.verse: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.

3937.verse: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?

3938.verse: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"

3939.verse: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,

3940.verse: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.

3941.verse: Has He chosen daughters over sons?
